issue.title: [Python] Add field() method to get field from StructType
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17139](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17139). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
From ARROW-17047:

We could also add a `field()` method to `StructType` that returns you a field? (that is more discoverable than [], and would be consistent with a Schema and with StructArray (to get the child array for that field))
